name: Purple Panic!
description:
★★★Purple Panic! ★★★

Game Controls:

Arrow Controls to move up and down /Jump

TAB to take out weapon

ENTER to put weapon away

SPACE to Attack / Talk to NPCs

Use the Cursor to  continue Talking / Use the Menu

If you've played the game and enjoyed it let know me!

If you like my art or want to see game updates check out my social medias:
